The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 23 September is 352,925 (627 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 19 September, there were 22,794 new confirmed cases (40.5 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 12 September, there were 19,508 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 17% (3286 extra cases).
